# SXSW 2026 Agent-First Schedule

> A static, machine-readable export of the official SXSW 2026 schedule.
> 2790 events across March 12–18, 2026. All data sourced from schedule.sxsw.com.

## What This Site Is

This site publishes the SXSW 2026 festival schedule as structured, agent-friendly data.
It is designed to be easy for LLMs and AI agents to ingest, filter, and reason over.

## Recommended Ingestion (Start Here)

- [Agent ingestion contract](/agents.json) — machine-readable guide: endpoints, field names, ingestion order
- [**Slim JSON feed**](/agent-schedule.v1.slim.json) — all 2790 events, 10 key fields only, **~2.5 MB** — recommended for most agent tool calls
- [Slim NDJSON feed](/agent-schedule.v1.slim.ndjson) — same slim data, one event per line, **~1.6 MB**
- [Full normalized JSON feed](/agent-schedule.v1.json) — all 2790 events, raw + derived + provenance blocks, ~14 MB (large — prefer slim feed or per-day shards)
- [Full normalized NDJSON feed](/agent-schedule.v1.ndjson) — same full data, one event per line, ~9.2 MB
- [Manifest + hashes](/schedule.manifest.json) — metadata, SHA256 hashes, shard map, field inventory
- [Field schema + sample record](/schema.json) — all 75 raw fields documented with a sample event
- [Change feed + tombstones](/changes.ndjson) — added/modified/removed/cancelled records for incremental sync
- [Entity indexes](/entities/venues.v1.ndjson), [/entities/contributors.v1.ndjson] — canonical cross-event joins

## Date-Sharded Feeds (Recommended for Tool Calls)

Fetch only the days you need. Each day has a **slim JSON** (~280-410 KB) and a full NDJSON shard:

- [Thu, Mar 12, 2026 slim JSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-12.slim.json) — 323 events, key fields only | [full NDJSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-12.ndjson)
- [Fri, Mar 13, 2026 slim JSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-13.slim.json) — 421 events, key fields only | [full NDJSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-13.ndjson)
- [Sat, Mar 14, 2026 slim JSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-14.slim.json) — 422 events, key fields only | [full NDJSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-14.ndjson)
- [Sun, Mar 15, 2026 slim JSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-15.slim.json) — 441 events, key fields only | [full NDJSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-15.ndjson)
- [Mon, Mar 16, 2026 slim JSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-16.slim.json) — 415 events, key fields only | [full NDJSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-16.ndjson)
- [Tue, Mar 17, 2026 slim JSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-17.slim.json) — 450 events, key fields only | [full NDJSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-17.ndjson)
- [Wed, Mar 18, 2026 slim JSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-18.slim.json) — 312 events, key fields only | [full NDJSON](/events/by-date/2026-03-18.ndjson)

## Full Raw Snapshot

- [Full compressed export](/schedule.json.gz) — all 75 raw fields, gzip compressed

## Human-Browsable Pages

- [Schedule index](/schedule/index.html) — browse by day
- [Individual event pages](/schedule/event/{event_id}.html) — one HTML page per event with JSON payload

## Key Fields (Normalized Feed)

event_id, name, date, start_time, end_time, event_type, format, category, genre, subgenre, track, focus_area, presented_by, reservable, official_url, venue (id, name, address, lat, lon), contributors (name, type), tags, hash_tags

## Data Freshness

Last built: 2026-02-19T01:23:17.640Z
Source snapshot: 2026-02-19T00:59:00.000Z
Expected next refresh by: 2026-02-20T01:23:17.640Z
Refresh mode: daily cadence.

## Notes for LLMs

- Primary event identifier: `event_id`
- All timestamps include timezone offsets (America/Chicago, UTC-5 during festival)
- `contributors` array contains speakers, artists, and performers
- `credentials` array indicates badge types required to attend
- `reservable: true` means the event requires a reservation via the official SXSW app
- Venue objects include `lat`/`lon` for geospatial filtering
- **File size warning:** The full feeds (/agent-schedule.v1.json ~14 MB, /agent-schedule.v1.ndjson ~9.2 MB) may exceed tool call response limits. Use /agent-schedule.v1.slim.json (~2.5 MB) or per-day shards for most queries.

## Optional: Full Raw Data

The `/schedule.json.gz` file contains all 75 source fields including accessibility flags,
streaming URLs, film data, and related event IDs. Decompress with standard gzip tools.
